text:
@senatemajldr #AYFKM
Priority #1. Getting kids back in school? Where? 
Florida? Texas?? Georgia???
We should trust the leaders who ignored science and caused the huge spike in COVID-19 cases with our kids well-being and our well-being.
Oh plenty of Military Pork in there too.
#AmyMcgrath2020
